title: Authorization migration "Completed with error"
content:
After you perform the authorization migration process, some of the authorization migration tasks have a "Completed with error" status.

Cause

The cause for this issue is unknown.

Solution

  1. Log in to the Suite Administration.
  2. Open the tenant and go to the Authorization migration tab.
  3. Get the detailed error message for the task.
    1. Press F12 in the browser window to open the Dev Tools.
    2. In the browser window, click Refresh on the Authorization migration tab.
    3. Click the log for the job in the Network Log list of the Dev Tools.
    4. On the Preview tab, expand the tasks node, and then locate and expand the task with the "Completed with error" status.
    5. Take note of the message value.
  4. Obtain the following logs from both the xruntime-platform pod and the xruntime-platform-offline pod (located in the <logging-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/${platform-pod}/maas directory):
    • maas_authorization_convergence.log
    • maas_authorization_convergence_idm_access.log
    • maas_error.log
  5. Open a support ticket, and include the task message and the log files in the ticket.
